chromeName.message: BB - Save Image as Type, Allow Right Click

edgeName.message: Browser Boost - Zana za Ziada za Edge

chromeDesc.message: Boost Volume, Change User Agent, Enable Right Click, Copy & Select, Disable WebRTC, and Save Image as Type (JPG, PNG & WebP).

edgeDesc.message: Ongeza Sauti, Badilisha Wakala wa Mtumiaji, Washa Bofya Kulia, Nakili & Chagua, Zima WebRTC, na Hifadhi Picha kama Aina (JPG, PNG & WebP).
